reviewText: Badly disguised advertisement for IB
I felt that this course was just an ad of their product. I expected advanced techniques or something like that
Breadth over depth. Not enough practice questions, but okay summary.
Too much focused on the broker platform

1. Content relating to options, their behavious and associated risks was quite basic2. Risks were stated but no information was provided to mitigate the risks as they emerge. IMO, risk management would have been very valuable. 3. Significant portion of the course covered a proprietary trading application instead covering the options in detail. This was a major shortcoming for anyone not interested in the proprietary application.
useful course - but I was not able to access the TWS - the link just took me to a blank screen
Actually, you should not trade futures just after this course, but it's a fine introduction.
Excellente, quite fast explanations, it would help to make them slower

This course is very good at teaching the overall scope of the derivatives market. 
The only problem that I had was the issue of transposing the information from the brokerage account used for this course to my etrade account. Other than that it was very informative
some concepts could have been explained in a better way....I had to refer to additional reading materials from google. Overall, the course helped me form a basic understanding of F&Os.

This is a pretty good course for learning about derivatives. After learning some basics of Futures and Options, I wanted to take such a course as  some sort of a revision of concepts, but I did end up learning new things. The instruction was clear. A good concise course overall.
M​uy bien detallado a las principales estrategias compuestas en opciones americanas, totalmente recomendado.
T​his course has briefly explained about the call and option features and its use with its practical use in the current market .
i​t is very helpful to me
I​mpressive !

Through this module, one can systematically learn derivatives trading in a holistic manner.  From basic terminologies to complex technicalities everything is boiled down to easy understanding. Also, the grade assignments helped  me to test my understanding and imprint the skills in my mind
It is easy course, but really interesting!
Very informative and easy to understand! Good Job!
I have been an option trader for a year, I think this course is very beginner friendly and yet it teaches me a lot of important terms and concepts. Recommend this course!
The course is actually quite amazing and interactive with its hand-on-approach to options and futures market. 10/10 would definitly recommend
Very
Very good examples with defining options & futures.

G​reat course with Steve in teaching derivatives. Really enjoyed following how to use the Trading system as I gain familiarity with IBrokers. Very pleased, I recommend this course for serious traders.
I​t gives  good overview of derivatives
A​n informative, well-presented insight into the world of Derivatives.
Good
Very amazing and accurate course though I wish there was one tuned for the Indian markets
Great course. I just missed some explaantions about commisions/fees in the practical usage.
THANKS TO STEVEN LEVINE
Clear break down and introduction to options trading strategies put in laymen's terms. I really enjoyed the course and will use this as a jumping point for continued learning.
E​xcellent course.
thanks for interactive brokers and coursera
